summary: Spartan Armor mod for Emperial Faction in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
First of all this is my first release mod and I spend 3 hours of watching tutorial on how to mod Skyrim and this is the result.Basically i based this mod on the movie 300 Spartan since it has a finishing or brutal like moves similar to the film.

Ok here is the features:
*Total Conversion of Emperial Armors including: Light,Medium and Heavy even the Shield has 2 types The silver one and the Bronze one similar to the 300 Film
*New Spartan Sword based on the Movie

Note:
Please do watch the video before downloading it to see how this mod works.

Update September 16, 2013:
*Spartan Armor Mod has been re-textured by vlad550077 and it\'s available to download
*Not just the armor, He resize the Spartan Shield like the 300 Film and also He retextured the sword
Note: He only re-texture the Medium Imperial Helmet, Light Emperial Cuirass, Heavy Imperial Gauntlets and Heavy Imperial Boots the rest are vanilla model.
author: jinkazama2k7
